actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to reaffirm and clarify the Federal relationship of the Burt Lake Band as a distinct federally recognized Indian tribe, and for other purposes.
short_title: Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians Act

summary.text: Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians Act - Reaffirms Federal recognition and rights of the Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians (in the State of Michigan), including the right to Federal benefits and tribal lands.

titles.title: Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians Act
A bill to reaffirm and clarify the Federal relationship of the Burt Lake Band as a distinct federally recognized Indian tribe, and for other purposes.
